alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Gadsden and central Leon Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 325 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Midway, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quincy, Midway, Havana, Tallahassee, Tallahassee Comm College, Freemont, Macon Community Park, Littman, Levy Park, Andrew, Florence, Scotland, Gibson, Tallahassee Coml Airport, Santa Clara, Shady Rest, Lake Jackson, Quincy Airport, Tallahassee Mall and Branchville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
